summary.span: 定义一个数据项与 控件中该数据项绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到其中的每个数据项都包含多个字段的数据源 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），如果不定义了任何菜单项绑定，菜单项将显示返回的值`ToString()`方法默认情况下的数据项。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素，菜单项显示的元素名称，显示的菜单中的基础结构，但其他方面不是非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise. 可以通过指定菜单项绑定到特定的字段绑定的菜单项的属性。You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings. 一个对象定义的每个数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to. > [!NOTE] > 当控件绑定到控件中，菜单项绑定不起任何作用。When the control is bound to a control, menu item bindings have no effect. 使用的站点地图提供程序自动执行绑定。Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider. 控制存储其中的对象属性，并将绑定应用到数据源以创建菜单层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 为数据源中每个数据项控制尝试匹配到数据项对象来创建相应的对象。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object to create the corresponding object. 创建时对象，您必须指定绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 该条件指示应在何时数据项绑定到菜单项。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 您可以指定，则，和 / 或。You can specify the , the , or both. 菜单项深度指定获取绑定的菜单级别。A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，以下声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段和属性，分别，其中所有节点的深度为 0:For example, the following declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 数据成员在基础数据源中，可以指定数据项的类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 分层数据源中的每个数据项 (由对象) 公开属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，一个 XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 如果数据源包含多个数据项目类型，数据成员指定数据项目类型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下声明绑定``的元素控件的菜单中，而不考虑层次结构中的位置中的所有菜单项：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 有时您可能需要创建指定深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member. 这通常用于数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项。This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value. 例如，可以有``出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。For example, you can have `` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file. 以下的声明显示了如何指定菜单项绑定到相同的数据应用于不同的菜单深度的成员：The following declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `` `` 如果菜单项绑定定义的深度和数据成员中，菜单项绑定应用到菜单中的所有菜单项。If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu. 这常用时所有数据项具有相同的属性，并且应在相同，显示，而不考虑的菜单深度。This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth. 建立绑定条件后，就可以绑定的属性可以绑定到值的对象。After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 可以将绑定到的数据项字段或静态值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 当绑定到静态值，所有对象到对象应用共享相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 属性绑定到字段包含数据源中的相应字段的值。Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 可以有选择地重写中的绑定的属性通过直接设置相应的属性的对象。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly. 下表列出的属性使您能够绑定的属性的类到的数据项的字段的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要绑定到字段属性的对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到字段属性的对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到字段属性的对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到字段属性的对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到字段属性的对象。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的属性使您能够绑定的属性的类为静态值的对象。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要将绑定到的静态值属性的对象。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果冲突对象定义，控件应用中按以下优先级顺序的菜单项绑定：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 对象定义并匹配仅的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 定义深度既不数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （此类型的菜单项绑定应用到菜单中的所有菜单项。）(This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5. 数据源中没有匹配项的对象。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项的方法然后绑定到并对其的菜单项的属性对象应用。In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the menu items to which the object is applied. 类还允许您通过设置菜单项中显示的文本格式属性。The class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象定义的字段之间的关系控件和菜单项在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用应用 对象的菜单项，以允许此菜单项显示一个弹出图像和任何子菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu item to which the object is applied is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.

value.span: 如果启用应用 的菜单项，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item to which the is applied is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来设置属性的对象。Use the property to set the property of a object. 此设置共享的所有菜单项对象应用。This setting is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当此属性设置为`false`，禁用的菜单项，并显示指示子项目没有弹出图像。When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed. 此属性设置为`false`实质上是菜单项上做出该菜单项的该节点，其中没有进一步的级别会显示该节点末尾。Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. > [!NOTE] > 您可以覆盖单个菜单项启用通过设置其直接属性。You can override the enabling of an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，首先必须通过设置建立绑定条件属性，属性，或两者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，用于指定应用 对象的菜单项的文本显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式字符串，用于指定应用 的菜单项的文本显示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于为菜单项的文本提供自定义格式。The property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text. 格式字符串可以包含文本字符串、 一个占位符，或两者。The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both. 占位符将被替换的值绑定到菜单项文本时，将按原义，显示的文本字符串。The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text. 占位符拆分为两个部分，用冒号，窗体中 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 例如，{0:F2}显示带两位小数位数的定点数。For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 占位符字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个占位符而不是文本字符串。The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 为遵循标准格式字符串语法，冒号之前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. 因为只有一个值可以显示在每个菜单项中，可以仅为 0 设置的参数索引。Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数法 （指数） 格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|一般情况下设置显示数值的格式。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它在指定的情况下显示的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数来显示数字。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性设置中的菜单项显示的文本的格式控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the text displayed in the menu items of a control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是示例站点地图数据的上一个示例。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在应用 对象的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 显示在应用 的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到自定义映像的 URL属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 与所有共享此映像对象到对象应用。This image is shared with all objects to which the object is applied. 图像的菜单项文本旁边显示，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置单个菜单项图像重写其直接属性。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性将在每个菜单项中显示相同映像，还可以使用属性将绑定属性的到数据源的字段的对象。Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the property to bind the property of a object to a field of a data source. 呈现时，属性的每个菜单项的对象应用包含该字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示的菜单项文本旁边的图像 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an image to display next to the text of the menu items. 此图像显示在每个菜单项的对象应用。This image is displayed in each menu item to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是示例站点地图数据的上一个示例。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

value.span: 绑定到应用 的 的 的字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the of a to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 呈现时，属性的每个菜单项的对象应用包含该字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 图像的菜单项文本旁边显示，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置单个菜单项图像重写其直接属性。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，首先必须通过设置建立绑定条件属性，属性，或两者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 而不是使用此属性将绑定的属性对象移到一个字段，还可以绑定它为静态值通过设置属性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 这使您可以在每个菜单项的显示相同的图像对象应用。This allows you to display the same image in each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称菜单项的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a menu item. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，在此目标窗口或框架中显示与应用 对象的菜单项关联的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用单击该菜单项时，属性指定的窗口或框架，用于显示 Web 内容链接到的菜单项。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将替代的属性对其的菜单项的控件对象应用。Setting this property overrides the property of the control for the menu items to which the object is applied. 您可以通过设置有选择地替代此属性直接每个菜单项的属性。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each menu item directly. 目标值必须以 A 到 Z （不区分大小写） 下, 表中所示，以下划线开头某些特殊值除外范围内的字母开头。Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出对象必须是符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议您不要使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定要在其中显示时单击该菜单项与菜单项关联的 Web 内容的窗口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window in which to display the Web content associated with a menu item, when that menu item is clicked. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是示例站点地图数据的上一个示例。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的文本属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 此文本显示在菜单项和共享的所有菜单项对象应用。This text is displayed in a menu item and is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置单个菜单项的文本重写其直接属性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性在每个菜单项中显示相同的文本，还可以绑定的属性通过设置数据源的字段对象属性。Instead of using this property to display the same text in each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时，属性的每个菜单项的对象应用包含该字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 无法创建中的空节点通过设置控件或属性为空字符串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 这些属性设置为空字符串作为未设置这些属性的效果相同。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在这种情况下，控件创建一个默认绑定使用属性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的文本属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 与对其所有菜单项共享该工具提示对象应用。This ToolTip is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当用户将鼠标指针定位在菜单项时，显示指定的文本。When the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, the specified text is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置单个菜单项的工具提示重写其直接属性。You can override the ToolTip for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 而不是使用此属性来指定每个菜单项的同一个工具提示，还可以绑定的属性通过设置数据源的字段对象属性。Instead of using this property to specify the same ToolTip for each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时，属性的每个菜单项的对象应用包含该字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在用户将鼠标指针定位在菜单项上时显示的工具提示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip to display when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item. 此工具提示显示每个菜单项对象应用。This ToolTip is displayed for each menu item to which the object is applied. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是示例站点地图数据的上一个示例。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件绑定到数据源，请使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称属性的对象。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a object. 呈现时，属性的每个菜单项的对象应用包含该字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. 用户将鼠标指针定位在菜单项上时，将显示指定的文本。The specified text is displayed when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item. > [!NOTE] > 可以通过设置单个菜单项的文本重写其直接属性。You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，首先必须通过设置建立绑定条件属性，属性，或两者。If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the property, the property, or both. 而不是使用此属性将绑定的属性对象移到一个字段，还可以绑定它为静态值通过设置属性。Instead of using this property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the property. 这使您可以向其显示每个菜单项的同一个工具提示对象应用。This allows you to display the same ToolTip for each menu item to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称菜单项的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the property of a menu item. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml.
